name: Anymo (Android)
description:
Anymo is a very fun game with very simple gameplay! The objective is to collect coins and diamonds. Watch out for robots, rockets and bombs as they damage you! Earn 600 points and level up. Every level a new challenge and a new adventure!

This game is a project being developed by Samuel Meireles. Software used: Photoshop, CorelDraw, Audacity, Unity, Visual Studio (C#).

Thank you so much for downloading this game!

Dedicated to my son Gary.
